dct_description_sm: Includes bibliographical references (p. xv-xvi) and indexes.

Small unrolled double hemisphere map draped over a table. California as an island with a round northern coast. Small winged angel holds a scroll with the signs of the Zodiac while pointing to a sphere
LC 3447; BN Manesson-Mallet I A & I B; Shirley 518
At page top, above map: DE LA SPHERE. [Page] 13[,] FIGURE V. [Page] 13 (map top right). Issued in his: Description de L’Univers, Tome I. – Paris, 1683
Issued in his German edition: Beschreibung des ganzen Welt-Kreisses ..., I, Franckfurt, 1684
Glen McLaughlin with Nancy H. Mayo.
